sections.heading: verdict; controls general verdict
sections.text: When the special finding of facts is inconsistent with the general verdict, the former controls the latter, and the court may give judgment accordingly.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 294, p. 443;R.S.1913, § 7859;C.S.1922, § 8803;C.S.1929, § 20-1120;R.S.1943, § 25-1120.Annot
